name: Drone Onsite Physical Inspection Checklist
description: Onsite physical inspection checklist for drone systems performed at the hangar with direct access

tasks.title: SAFETY: Pre-inspection safety check
tasks.description:
Ensure all safety protocols are followed before beginning physical inspection.

Confirm drone is powered down and secured.
Verify workspace is clear and safe.
Ensure proper PPE is available if required.
Confirm emergency procedures are understood.

tasks.title: STRUCTURE: Physical airframe and mounting inspection
tasks.description:
Physically inspect drone structure and all mounting points.

Check motor arms for cracks or damage.
Verify all mounting bolts are secure and torqued.
Inspect landing gear integrity.
Check drone core for any structural damage.
Verify WASP and payload attachments.

tasks.title: PROPULSION: Motors and propellers physical check
tasks.description:
Manually inspect propulsion system components.

Rotate each motor by hand to check for resistance.
Flex test propellers for cracks or damage.
Check propeller mounting and locking.
Inspect ESCs for damage or overheating signs.
Verify motor mount security.
instructions: Verify no play in motor mounts

tasks.title: POWER: Battery and electrical inspection
tasks.description:
Inspect power systems and connections.

Remove and inspect battery for swelling.
Check all power connectors for damage.
Inspect main power distribution.
Verify umbilical connection contacts.
Check for any signs of electrical damage.
instructions: Look for burn marks or damage

tasks.title: SYSTEMS: Sensors and communication verification
tasks.description:
Check all sensors and communication equipment.

Clean all camera lenses and sensors.
Verify antenna connections and condition.
Check GPS/compass module mounting.
Inspect gimbal movement and wiring.
Power on and verify basic system operation.
